feature.evaluation

Class Info

  • java.lang.Object
    • feature.evaluation.DiscreteAttributeEvaluator
      • feature.evaluation.Info

  • public class Info
extends DiscreteAttributeEvaluator
    This class implements methods for calculating the information content of value splits on different features in the data.

      • evaluateInfoOfCategorySplit

        public static float evaluateInfoOfCategorySplit(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>[] split,
                                int numClasses)
        This method handles the case when the category values are given directly instead of indexes to DataInstance objects.
        Parameters:
        split - An array of integer valued lists that denote the categories of the instances in the split.
        numClasses - Integer that is the number of classes in the data.
        Returns:
        Float value that is the information content of the split.
